name: Bordered SNS Icons Toolkit
description:
Export transparent icons that are compatible with Twitter and Instagram light and dark modes.


e.g. Twitter Fleets, Twitter Spaces, Instagram Stories, Instagram Lives.


In the case of Twitter, transparent icons are not reflected in uploads from apps or browsers, so use a service that allows uploads via the Twitter API.


e.g. TwitterのアイコンをAPI経由でアップロードするツール
